projectDetail: It's a drawing application designed for kids. This game is made on Unity for iOS platform.
myContribution: Fix admob interstitial ads not showing

additionalDetails.title: AdMob Interstitial
additionalDetails.description: They used premium drawing template from asset store. It came with pre-installed admob scripts. Used scripts were backdated and had obsolate code. I updated them with current admob version.

additionalDetails.title: Appstore Production
additionalDetails.description: After fixing admob issue I used client mac to upload in testflight for testing and pushing to production.

projectDetail: Luddu is a classic board game with tournament feature. this game is made on Unity Engine for android platform. The team consist of two programmer and a backend react developer.
myContribution:
1. Facebook, Google and Email Login.
2. Forget password system.
3. Custom News feed system handled using API call.
